q.quote: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.
q.author: Coco Chanel

q.quote: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
q.author: Sammy Hagar

q.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.

q.quote: Obedience to lawful authority is the foundation of manly character.
q.author: Robert E. Lee

q.quote: May this marriage be full of laughter, our every day in paradise.
q.author: Rumi

q.quote: We are not here to curse the darkness, but to light the candle that can guide us thru that darkness to a safe and sane future.
q.author: John F. Kennedy

q.quote: Every year on your birthday, you get a chance to start new.
q.author: Sammy Hagar

q.quote: Beauty is truth's smile when she beholds her own face in a perfect mirror.
q.author: Rabindranath Tagore

q.quote: Have patience. All things are difficult before they become easy.
q.author: Sammy Hagar

q.quote: Over and over I marvel at the blessings of my life: Each year has grown better than the last.
q.author: Lawrence Welk

q.quote: You can cut all the flowers but you cannot keep spring from coming.
q.author: Lawrence Welk

q.quote: Football is football and talent is talent. But the mindset of your team makes all the difference.
